ProjectsData.description1: BookWise is an online library platform that allows students to borrow books with administrator permission. It includes advanced features: advanced backend, JWT authentication, inactivity and welcome emails, Rate Limiting, role-based permissions, and book creation by the admin.

ProjectsData.description2: My personal portfolio. This project strengthened my skills in design and smooth animations using Motion, MagicUI, and Next-Intl for internationalization.

ProjectsData.description3: A Netflix clone where users can search for movies and series and view details. This project enhanced my skills in API handling, data fetching, and search/filter algorithms.

ProjectsData.description4: A landing page presenting a shoe selling platform. This project helped me improve my design skills and create fast and high-performance sites.

Formations.description1: An accelerated training in backend web development with JavaScript. This program deepened my understanding of backend concepts with JavaScript frameworks through concrete projects.

Formations.description2: A hands-on workshop on UI/UX design using Figma. I learned how to mockup and prototype applications before development and mastered Figma for creating modern and intuitive designs.

Formations.description3: Since 2022, I have been self-learning fullstack web development through platforms like Udemy, JavaScript Mastery, and Grafikart. This allowed me to master React and Next.js, a stack I particularly enjoy.

Experiences.description1: Design and development of SEO-optimized, high-performance, and scalable applications and websites for individuals and businesses using modern stacks like Next.js, Shadcn UI, PostgreSQL, and Upstash with smooth animations.

Experiences.description2: Design and development of an SEO-optimized and high-performance site for Falcong Technologie using React.js, TailwindCSS for styling, and Framer Motion for smooth animations.

Experiences.description3: Design and development of SEO-optimized and high-performance applications and websites for individuals and SMEs using PHP for the backend and JavaScript/Bootstrap for smooth interfaces.
